name: Bux Woocommerce
author: UBX Philippines

sections.description:
Bux is the best payment gateway for online sellers. Sell products online, generate payment codes via Messenger app, and transfer funds to your bank.

Bux allows your website to accept payments from Over-the-counter channels (7-Eleven, Cebuana Pawnshop, LBC, Palawan, SM Dept Stores, Bayad Center, etc).
Bux also allows you to accept payments from GCash and Online Banking channels such as UnionBank, BPI and RCBC.

This Plugin integrates your online store to Bux Payment Platform.

To know more visit Bux’s website or Facebook Page:

https://bux.ph/
https://facebook.com/buxph/
sections.faq:
Questions?

Please see https://bux.ph/faq

Want to contact us?

Please email us at support+bux@ubx.ph
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release.
  • Checkout support 7-eleven payments

1.0.2

  • Support for Cebuana, LBC, Bayad Center, etc

1.0.3

  • Online Banking enable

1.0.4

  • Update descriptions

1.1.0

  • Include Test Mode

1.1.1

  • Paid Update on Thank you page

1.1.2

  • Mobile View Thank you page

1.1.3

  • Restock on expired notification from bux

1.1.4

  • Restock double posting handling

1.1.5

  • Only update order from postback if came from Pending Bux Payment status

1.1.6

  • check for pending-bux instead of wc-pending-bux

1.1.7

  • update link based on full link_url returned

1.1.8

  • Update to not clear cart upon fail checkout

1.1.9

  • Shoulder Transaction fee update

1.2.0

  • Removing maximum amount for Enterprise users

1.2.1

  • Fixed authorize endpoint for credential

1.2.2

  • Add order_id on return_url

1.2.3

  • URL encode return_url

short_description: Bux plugin for Woocommerce, you need to have Woocommerce installed
